displaypref.newtabswitch.message: Open in a new tab and focus the tab

displaypref.newtab.message: Open in a new tab without focusing the tab

displaypref.newwindow.message: Open in a new browser window

savesearches.message: Remember search fields when popup is closed

trackextension.message: Send extension usage (e.g edition installed, catalogs used for searches) [Note: LibX uses Google Analytics]

tracklibapps.message: Send libapp usage (e.g frequently used libapps) [Note: LibX uses Google Analytics]
